front.title: The Generalized TTL Security Mechanism (GTSM) for Label Distribution Protocol (LDP)

abstract.t: The Generalized TTL Security Mechanism (GTSM) describes a generalizeduse of a packets Time to Live (TTL) (IPv4) or Hop Limit (IPv6) toverify that the packet was sourced by a node on a connected link,thereby protecting the router's IP control-plane from CPU utilizationbased attacks. This technique improves security and is used by manyprotocols. This document defines the GTSM use for Label DistributionProtocol (LDP).
